resources.string:
The app will generate a random number between the given range.
 You have 10 chances to guess the random number generated.
 Next Level will unlock only if the previous levels are cleared.
 The higher levels you go , the larger the range will become.

 LEVEL 1 	-> Range (1 - 100)
 LEVEL 2 	-> Range (1 - 200)
 LEVEL 3 	-> Range (1 - 300)
 LEVEL 4 	-> Range (1 - 400)
 LEVEL 5 	-> Range (1 - 500)
 LEVEL 6 	-> Range (1 - 600)
 LEVEL 7 	-> Range (1 - 700)
 LEVEL 8 	-> Range (1 - 800)
 LEVEL 9 	-> Range (1 - 900)
 LEVEL 10	-> Range (1 - 1000)
